SELECT count(1) FROM ((((ha_billRecords bl LEFT JOIN ha_operator o ON bl.optMan=o.operator_code) LEFT JOIN ha_custom u ON u.custid=bl.custid) LEFT JOIN ha_room r ON r.custid=u.custid) LEFT JOIN ha_building b ON r.buildingid=b.buildingid) LEFT JOIN ha_area a ON b.areaid=a.areaid WHERE (bl.operation='收费' OR bl.operation='恢复收费')
AND a.areaid IN #{HaBillrecords.nodeIds}
AND POSITION(#{HaBillrecords.nodeIds} in Left(a.areaNo, 1))>0
and bl.optTime between date(#{HaBillrecords.kaiShi,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}) and date(#{HaBillrecords.JieShu,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

SELECT count(1) FROM ha_billRecords b LEFT JOIN ha_operator o ON b.optMan=o.operator_code
AND b.custid = ${HaBillrecords.custid}
AND POSITION('${HaBillrecords.optType}' in b.operation)>0
and b.optTime between date(#{HaBillrecords.kaiShi,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}) and date(#{HaBillrecords.JieShu,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

SELECT case when Count(br1.bId)> (SELECT Count(br2.bId) FROM ha_billRecords br2 WHERE br2.operation='恢复收费' AND #{custid}=br2.custid AND '${charge}'=to_char(br2.charge, '0.00')) then 'true' else 'false' end FROM ha_billRecords br1 WHERE br1.operation='收费' AND to_char(br1.charge, '0.00')='${charge}' AND br1.custid=#{custId}
